TEST.0.title: 2024 North Carolina Division C Regional 6
TEST.0.customHeader:
Names of participants: (Please print neatly)

 
 
 
School Name:

Check your team:  ◻ Varsity     ◻ JV1      JV2     ◻ JV3

Warning: Do not open this packet until given permission to do so.

Note: There are useful notes after this page.

CIPHER.104.cipherString: Doing things that you are not supposed to do at work makes your vision, hearing and alertness much better.
CIPHER.104.question: The following quote is an Aristocrat for you to decode.  What does it decode to?

CIPHER.116.cipherString: Bring something incomprehensible into the world!
CIPHER.116.question: A quote by Gilles Deleuze has been encoded using the Fractionated Morse Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the quote starts with BRIN.
CIPHER.116.author: Gilles Deleuze

CIPHER.113.cipherString: Ready for the only way to enjoy Instagram? Follow zero people. Follow every dog.
CIPHER.113.question: The following quote needs to be decoded with the Nihilist Substitition Cipher with a keyword of LEAD and polybius key of STRANGELY.
CIPHER.113.author: Unknown

CIPHER.120.cipherString: Some like to believe it's the book that chooses the person.
CIPHER.120.question: The following symbols are a Baconian Cipher which encode a quote by Carlos Ruiz Zafon.  What did they say?
CIPHER.120.author: Carlos Ruiz Zafon

CIPHER.117.cipherString: A huge dog, tied by a chain, was painted on the wall and over it was written in capital letters 'Beware of the dog.'
CIPHER.117.question: A quote by Petronius Arbiter has been encoded using the K1 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. You are told the letter P decodes to O.
CIPHER.117.author: Petronius Arbiter

CIPHER.123.cipherString: It isn't where you came from; it's where you're going that counts.
CIPHER.123.question: A quote by Ella Fitzgerald has been encoded using the Complete Columnar Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the quote has CAME somewhere in it.
CIPHER.123.author: Ella Fitzgerald

CIPHER.122.cipherString: La verdad que hace libres a los hombres es, en su mayor parte, la verdad que los hombres prefieren no oír.
CIPHER.122.question: A quote by Herbert Agar has been translated into Spanish and then encoded as an Aristocrat using a K1 alphabet with an English word.  What does it decode to?
CIPHER.122.author: Herbert Agar
CIPHER.122.translation: The truth which makes men free is for the most part the truth which men prefer not to hear.

CIPHER.114.cipherString: What right do we have to dream of another world, if we can't take care of this one.
CIPHER.114.question: A quote by George A. Gomez has been encoded as Complete Columnar cipher.  What does it decode to?
CIPHER.114.author: George A. Gomez

CIPHER.112.cipherString: I've never once been able to explain my car trouble to a mechanic without resorting to sound effects.
CIPHER.112.question: An observation from the internet has been encoded using as an Aristocrat using a K3 alphabet key phrase.  Wat was the key phrase used to encode it?
CIPHER.112.author: Unknown

CIPHER.119.cipherString: Books are a life to one's soul
CIPHER.119.question: Decode the following quote by Gugu Mofokeng which was encoded as a 2x2 Hill Cipher using a keyword of TURN.
CIPHER.119.author: Gugu Mofokeng

CIPHER.150.cipherString: A Universe that can be easily understood would logically be too simple to evolve into beings capable of understanding it.
CIPHER.150.question: A quote by Joseph Rain has been encoded using the K1 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the letter C decodes to T
CIPHER.150.author: Joseph Rain

CIPHER.105.cipherString: The most common way people give up their power is by thinking they don't have any.
CIPHER.105.question: The following quote by Alice Walker needs to be decoded with the Nihilist Substitition Cipher with a keyword of MAIN and polybius key of BOUNDARIES.
CIPHER.105.author: Alice Walker

CIPHER.124.cipherString: We have inherited from our forefathers the keen longing for unified, all-embracing knowledge.
CIPHER.124.question: The following quote by Erwin Schrödinger has been encoded as an Aristocrat using a K1 alphabet.  You are told that  the letter N decodes to O.  What did they say?
CIPHER.124.author: Erwin Schrödinger

CIPHER.111.cipherString: True knowledge makes a man reject the wrong , by chosen what is right.
CIPHER.111.question: The following quote by Lailah Gifty Akita needs to be decoded with the Porta Cipher with a keyword of INTO
CIPHER.111.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

CIPHER.109.cipherString: A life without a purpose is a rambling one.
CIPHER.109.question: The following strange headlines encode a quote by Seneca using a Baconian cipher. You are told that the deciphered text starts with A LIF
CIPHER.109.author: Seneca

CIPHER.121.question: The following cryptarithm provides the key to decoding the values 46257 301659. What do they decode to?

CIPHER.118.cipherString: Just pick a goal and stick to it - no big complicated secret.
CIPHER.118.question: The following words are a Baconian cipher encoding advice from Richelle Goodrich.  What do they decode to?
CIPHER.118.author: Richelle Goodrich

CIPHER.107.question: The following cryptarithm provides the key to decoding the values 0 4731 2648 9753. What do they decode to?

CIPHER.106.cipherString: Music is the only one of the fine arts in which not only man, but all other animals, have a common property.
CIPHER.106.question: A quote by Jean Paul has been encoded as an Aristocrat Cipher. You are told that the letter C decodes to E.  What does it decode to?
CIPHER.106.author: Jean Paul.

CIPHER.115.cipherString: Having what you want may give you Achievement. But wanting what you have will give you Fulfillment.
CIPHER.115.question: A quote by R.V.M. has been encoded using the K2 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the letter S decodes to E.
CIPHER.115.author: R.V.M.

CIPHER.110.cipherString: Owe watt uh feeling wen ewe hapen up on uh book taht semes two por truth directly into your hed.
CIPHER.110.question: Your friend who can't spell or type very well took a quote from Garry Fitchett and encoded it as an Aristocrat using a K1 alphabet.  What does it decode to?
CIPHER.110.author: Garry Fitchett
